reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Building capacity to reduce corruption and improve the business environment in the Philippines

description.narrative: The project supports and builds the continued effective anti-corruption interventions by the Office of the Ombudsman that improve the Philippine investment climate and overall country competitiveness, particularly through capacity building workshops and development of official modules on standard practices involving investigation and prosecution of graft and corruption cases, in close partnership with the National Integrity Centre.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
